abstract: David L. Strickland, who runs the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, said his agency had asked for help in reviewing “a huge volume of documents.”
snippet: David L. Strickland, who runs the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, said his agency had asked for help in reviewing “a huge volume of documents.”
lead_paragraph: NASA scientists and federal law enforcement officials are assisting with the safety investigation into Toyota’s recalls of millions of vehicles, federal regulators said Wednesday.

headline.main: NASA and Justice Assist Toyota Inquiry
headline.print_headline: NASA and Justice Assist Toyota Inquiry
